trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_SEQ_00<tab>Much like her brother, Alisaie also loves it when a plan comes together.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_TODO_00<tab>Follow Alisaie to the Isle of Zekki.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_TODO_01<tab>Seek out and slay Red Kojin near the Dive.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_TODO_02<tab>Seek out and slay Red Kojin elsewhere on the Isle of Zekki.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_TODO_03<tab>Search for Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_TODO_04<tab>Rendezvous with Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_000<tab>This has to work. I know it! I just hope Gosetsu and the others are all right...

TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_BUNCHIN_000_005<tab>Beneath the waters to the west of Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato lies a cave that will lead you to the Isle of Zekki. May the kami watch over and keep you.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>I don't know about you two, but I'm as ready as I'll ever be.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_011<tab>Me too. Let's do this!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_012<tab>Right. Right. Naught left to say, then...
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_Q1_000_013<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_A1_000_014<tab>To the Isle of Zekki!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_A1_000_015<tab>You nervous?
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_016<tab>R-Right! Let's go and find that cave!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_017<tab>Me? Nervous? Come now. I mean, it's not as though I haven't risked my life in ridiculous ways before.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_018<tab>Well, maybe I am a little bit... Hm. Strangest thing, that. Completely out of character, even. Anyway, let's go!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_020<tab>I hope you didn't waste too much energy swimming here. Once the fighting starts, I doubt we'll have a moment to rest.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>Assuming this is the right cave, it should lead us straight into the heart of the Isle of Zekki...
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_031<tab>Have you got a plan for once we get to the isle?
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_032<tab>Hmm... How about two of us get the guards' attention while the third heads straight for the vault?
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_033<tab>Afterwards, the other two join them there, and together we make a stand. With our numbers, it's not feasible to do anything more complicated, I think.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_034<tab>Fine by me. I like simple plans. I'll be one of the decoys, then.

TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_035<tab>You read my mind. I also had a mind to ask <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to be one, given <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> peerless martial prowess.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_036<tab>Then it's settled. You two will make your way through the stronghold, creating as much chaos as possible. You know, have some fun.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_037<tab>Meanwhile, I will attempt to locate the vault and gain entry with the ceremonial knife. When I am inside, I will contact you via linkpearl.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_038<tab>Right! Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We've got work to do!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_BALLOON_000_040<tab>Intruders!? Here!?
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_BALLOON_000_041<tab>Thieves, thieves!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_BALLOON_000_042<tab>Seize them!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_BALLOON_000_043<tab>How did they get here!?
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_044<tab>You're a sight for sore eyes! I hope Alisaie's all right too...
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>(-Alisaie-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Lyse, can you hear me? I've found the vault!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_046<tab>(-Alisaie-)Head northwest. There's a passage leading deeper within. Hurry!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_050<tab>Come on, you Red bastards! Is that the best you can do!?
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>There you are! The entrance is straight ahead.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>Good timing, I might add. It sounds like the whole garrison is headed straight for us...
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_LYSE_000_070<tab>We should, um...we should definitely talk strategy before we do anything else!
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_080<tab><pant> <pant> That...that was not part of the plan! A Kojin primal was most definitely not part of the plan!

TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_081<tab>...Though I am sure there is a perfectly logical explanation involving the aether stored in the treasures and the religious fervor with which the Kojin guard them. Or something. <sigh> A pity Alphinaud isn't here to provide it.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_082<tab>And just when I thought our fortunes had changed. I swear, if Soroban and his people knew this might happen...
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_083<tab>...No, somehow I doubt that. Even the Red seemed surprised by what happened.
TEXT_STMBDA312_02488_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>All rises and falls at the whim of capricious fortune, does it? Then the same goes for him. We have to defeat that primal!
